trans-unit.source: Represents a tablet pen used with a Tablet PC.
trans-unit.target: Tablet PC와 함께 사용 되는 태블릿 펜을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref> that reports current input for the stylus.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref> 현재 스타일러스 입력을 보고 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref> that reports current input for the stylus.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref> 현재 스타일러스 입력을 보고 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Binds input from the stylus to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 요소에 스타일러스 입력에 바인딩.

trans-unit.source: The element to which the stylus is bound.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the input element is captured successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>input 요소를 성공적으로 캡처 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
element is .
element is neither or .
Binds the stylus to the specified element.
The element to which the stylus is bound.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode"></xref> values.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the input element is captured successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>input 요소를 성공적으로 캡처 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
element or captureMode is .
element is neither or .
Gets the element that captured the stylus.
The <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> that captured the stylus.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> that the pointer is positioned over.
The element the pointer is over.
Gets the position of the stylus.
The <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> to which the (`x,y`) coordinates are mapped.
A that represents the position of the stylus, in relation to relativeTo.
trans-unit.target: A 에, 스타일러스의 위치를 나타내는 relativeTo 합니다.

trans-unit.source: relativeTo is neither or .
Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that contains <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects collected from the stylus.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> 를 포함 하 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> 스타일러스에서 수집 되는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> to which the (`x,y`) coordinates in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> are mapped.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that contains <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects that the stylus collected.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> 포함 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> 스타일러스 수집 하는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: relativeTo is neither or .
Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that contains <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects collected from the stylus.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> 를 포함 하 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> 스타일러스에서 수집 되는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Uses the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.

`subsetToReformatTo` must be compatible with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> used by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice.GetStylusPoints%28System.Windows.IInputElement%29> method.
trans-unit.target: `subsetToReformatTo`와 호환 되어야 합니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>에서 사용 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice.GetStylusPoints%28System.Windows.IInputElement%29>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice.GetStylusPoints%28System.Windows.IInputElement%29> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A> method to get a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> before calling the GetStylusPoints method.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A>가져올 메서드를 한 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>GetStylusPoints 메서드 호출 하기 전에.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> to which the (`x y`) coordinates in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> are mapped.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to be used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to be used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that contains <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects collected from the stylus.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> 포함 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> 스타일러스에서 수집 되는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: relativeTo is neither or .
Gets the identifier for the stylus device.
trans-unit.target: 스타일러스 장치에 대 한 식별자를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the stylus device.
Gets whether the tablet pen is positioned above, yet not in contact with, the digitizer.
trans-unit.target: 태블릿 펜이 아직 디지타이저 위에 디지타이저와 접촉 되어 하지 여부를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the pen is positioned above, yet not in contact with, the digitizer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>펜이 아직 디지타이저 위에; 디지타이저와 접촉 되어 하지 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether the tablet pen is in range of the digitizer.
trans-unit.target: 태블릿 펜이 디지타이저 범위 안에 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the pen is within range of the digitizer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>펜이 디지타이저; 범위 내에서 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether the secondary tip of the stylus is in use.
trans-unit.target: 스타일러스의 보조 팁 사용 중인지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the secondary tip of the stylus is in use; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>스타일러스의 보조 팁 사용 중인 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether a stylus device is valid.
trans-unit.target: 스타일러스 장치가 유효한 지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate a stylus is valid; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>스타일러스를 나타내기 위해 잘못 되었습니다. 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the stylus.
The name of the stylus.
Gets the stylus buttons on the stylus.
A reference to a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusButtonCollection"></xref> object representing all of the buttons on the stylus.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 참조는 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusButtonCollection"> </xref> 모든가 스타일러스의 단추를 나타내는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Synchronizes the cursor and the user interface.
Applications may need to locate the element that the cursor is positioned over.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램을 통해 커서를 두면 요소를 찾는 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the application uses animation, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice.DirectlyOver%2A> method might return an element that has moved out from under the cursor.
trans-unit.target: 애니메이션을 사용 하면 응용 프로그램의 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice.DirectlyOver%2A>메서드 커서 아래쪽에서 옮겼습니다 하는 요소를 반환할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice.DirectlyOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call Synchronize to be sure that <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice.DirectlyOver%2A> returns the proper element.
trans-unit.target: 동기화 할 수 있도록 호출 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice.DirectlyOver%2A>올바른 요소를 반환 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice.DirectlyOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"></xref> representing the digitizer associated with the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"> </xref> 현재와 연결 된 디지타이저 나타내는 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"></xref> represents the digitizer associated with the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"> </xref> 현재와 연결 된 디지타이저 나타냅니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that receives input.
The <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> object that receives input.
Returns the name of the stylus device.
The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"></xref>.
